Text:
@brianxxx

Steeve has ceased his attacks and so should you. I mean come on man, he hasn't posted hate comments on other torrents of recently uploaded animal porn. So lets all declare a ceasefire.

@Loposter
kindly upload some SHEMALES fucking animals movie.

I will gladly cease. But you are wrong about him ceasing his attacks because he was storming the older posts and commenting in them.

Personally, I could not care less. It was fun for me and I was having a fun laugh the whole time. But it is VERY WRONG for someone to come here and make judgments. There are probably tons of files that steevo has downloaded that people would have 'issues' with and he would not like the judgment as much as he does not like this flame war.

So, as long as he lives and lets other people live...so be it and I will cease.

thanks brian and steve, life is too short to hate eachother and download the porn.

have a great weekend.
